title: Ticket #3885: Auth for chirp-based qedits is not recorded in the AuditLog
description:
Looking through the AuditLog on one of our CEs, I noticed that queue edits from condor_chirp do not have any connection details recorded.

For example: 

08/29/13 19:38:38 (cid:13027835) Set Attribute for job 2057591.0, glexec_user = "hcc"

That's all the info I got from cid:13027835. I suspect this is because the connection comes from a pre-existing condor_shadow auth session.
